thread.title: EE Fined £1m For Customer Complaint Failures

title: EE Fined £1m For Customer Complaint Failures
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 3, 2015, 07:14 BST - UK Markets open in 46 mins. EE Fined £1m For Customer Complaint Failures By (c) Sky News 2015 | Sky News – 7 minutes ago 

EE has been fined £1m by the telecoms regulator for failures in its handling of customer complaints.
